text: The men's 20 kilometres race walk at the 2018 European Athletics Championships took place at the Olympic Stadium on 7 August. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=75% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2018 European Athletics Championships |- |World record | |1:16:36 |Nomi, Japan |15 March 2015 |- |European record | |1:17:02 |Arles, France |8 March 2015 |- |Championship record | |1:18:37 |Munich, Germany |6 August 2002 |- |World Leading | |1:17:25 |Cheboksary, Russia |9 June 2018 |- |European Leading | |1:17:25 |Cheboksary, Russia |9 June 2018 |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" !
